thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Betsy

author: Betsy
title: Betsy
text: Thriftbooks has become my first stop when I'm looking for books. Since we homeschool, we buy lots of books. Thriftbooks has such amazing prices and their free shipping with $10 order is a big money-saver. I have had one order not be delivered in the past and as soon as I notified them, they reshipped the order the same day. They have been great to work with and I would highly recommend them.
